docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

apis.short_description: Add one or more host collections to one or more hosts

params.name: organization_id
params.description: ID of the organization
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..

params.name: search
params.description: Search string for hosts to perform an action on

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to perform an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to exclude and not run an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: host_collection_ids
params.description: List of host collection ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

apis.short_description: Remove one or more host collections from one or more hosts

params.name: search
params.description: Search string for hosts to perform an action on

params.name: ids

params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to exclude and not run an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: host_collection_ids
params.description: List of host collection ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: search
params.description: Search string for hosts to perform an action on

apis.short_description: Install content on one or more hosts

params.name: organization_id
params.description: ID of the organization
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..

params.name: search
params.description: Search string for hosts to perform an action on

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to perform an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to exclude and not run an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: content_type
params.description: The type of content. The following types are supported: ‘package’, ‘package_group’ and ‘errata’.

params.name: content
params.description: List of content (e.g. package names, package group names or errata ids)
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

apis.short_description: Update content on one or more hosts

params.name: organization_id
params.description: ID of the organization
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..

params.name: search
params.description: Search string for hosts to perform an action on

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to perform an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to exclude and not run an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: content_type
params.description: The type of content. The following types are supported: ‘package’ and ‘package_group.

params.name: content
params.description: List of content (e.g. package or package group names)
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: update_all
params.description: Updates all packages on the host(s)

apis.short_description: Remove subscriptions from one or more hosts

params.name: organization_id
params.description: ID of the organization
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..

params.name: search
params.description: Search string for hosts to perform an action on

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to perform an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to exclude and not run an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: subscriptions
params.description: Array of subscriptions to remove
params.validator: Must be an Array of nested elements

params.name: id
params.description: Subscription Pool id

params.name: quantity
params.description: Quantity of specified subscription to remove

apis.short_description: Add subscriptions to one or more hosts

params.name: organization_id
params.description: ID of the organization
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..

params.name: search
params.description: Search string for hosts to perform an action on

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to perform an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to exclude and not run an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: subscriptions
params.description: Array of subscriptions to add
params.validator: Must be an Array of nested elements

params.name: id
params.description: Subscription Pool id

params.name: quantity
params.description: Quantity of this subscriptions to add
